name: OpenCampfireSounds-NightRelaxsound
0:
”Alexa, open campfire sounds”
”Alexa, ask campfire sounds what is this”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: campfire sounds
des:
Enter the world of your imagination and mind relaxing sleep in minutes. As Alexa to open cricket sound and sleep back. The skill will help you to get sleep very soon. Audio in the skill is especially recorded from the jungle and brought to you directly from the woods. Relaxing nature sounds of crickets chirping, summer night noises. The skill offers a plethora of relaxing and healing nature sounds with no distractions. Enjoy listening to calming sounds of the night as you drift off to sleep.

In today’s world, peace and quiet can be something of a rarity. The sound of neighbors laughing late into the night, your partner snoring, music playing from across the hall, a buzzing phone on the bedside table, a television left on— – there are an array of everyday noises that can disturb you and have detrimental effects given the importance of sleep on overall health. However, perfect silence isn’t always necessary or even desirable. Some sounds at night can actually enhance your sleep. 

Alexa skill will help:
1. HELPS YOU BUILD A BEDTIME RITUAL

Especially if you have trouble falling asleep, but even if you don’t, it’s a good idea to establish a routine before bed (both for children and adults). Make sleep hygiene a habit!



2. KEEPS YOUR BEDROOM QUIET

For optimal sleep, you need the optimal sleep environment. Cricket sounds buffers disturbing sounds and creates a quiet cocoon, regardless of your surroundings or sleep situation.

 

3. SHUTS DOWN YOUR BUSY BRAIN

Ever have trouble falling asleep because your To-Do list won’t stop buzzing, or personal worries keep you awake? Cricket sounds can help - it’s even shown to help ease symptoms of anxiety. There’s a reason some people use it to meditate!

4. ONCE YOU'RE ASLEEP, YOU STAY ASLEEP

By masking sounds that might interrupt your sleep, Cricket sounds to protect your peaceful slumber. And if you DO wake up, it’s often easier to fall back asleep. 



5. YOU'LL SLEEP MORE SOUNDLY

You may not realize how many times you wake up each night. But even if you don’t remember it in the morning, those little interruptions affect the quality of your sleep. So give Cricket sounds a try and see if you don’t wake up feeling more refreshed.



6. YOU CAN TAKE Cricket Sounds fro Alexa ANYWHERE

While you can’t count on your environment, you CAN manage the noise factor, if you’ve got a sound machine in Alexa. And many are compact and portable, making them easy to throw into a suitcase, diaper bag, or handbag. (This one’s especially helpful when traveling. Hotel room doors slamming and noisy hallways, anywhere?)


1. Frequent Waking Lowers Sleep Satisfaction
2. Stressful Sounds Increase Sleep Struggles
3. Noisy Environments Cause Restlessness
4. How to Manage A Noisy Bedroom

Relaxing sounds Nature sounds Water sounds Running water sounds Outdoor sounds Babbling brook sounds Oscillating fan sounds Fireplace sounds Forest sounds Country night sounds Ocean sounds Rain sounds River sounds Thunderstorm sounds White noise

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
